# Module: tf.contrib.kfac



Defined in [`tensorflow/contrib/kfac/__init__.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.4/tensorflow/contrib/kfac/__init__.py).

Kronecker-factored Approximate Curvature Optimizer.

## Modules

[`curvature_matrix_vector_products`](../../tf/contrib/kfac/curvature_matrix_vector_products) module: Curvature matrix-vector multiplication.

[`estimator`](../../tf/contrib/kfac/estimator) module: Defines the high-level Fisher estimator class.

[`fisher_blocks`](../../tf/contrib/kfac/fisher_blocks) module: FisherBlock definitions.

[`fisher_factors`](../../tf/contrib/kfac/fisher_factors) module: FisherFactor definitions.

[`layer_collection`](../../tf/contrib/kfac/layer_collection) module: Registry for layers and their parameters/variables.

[`loss_functions`](../../tf/contrib/kfac/loss_functions) module: Loss functions to be used by LayerCollection.

[`op_queue`](../../tf/contrib/kfac/op_queue) module: Helper for choosing which op to run next in a distributed setting.

[`optimizer`](../../tf/contrib/kfac/optimizer) module: The KFAC optimizer.

[`utils`](../../tf/contrib/kfac/utils) module: Utility functions.
